about_the_game:
The Lore behind Lil' Arena

This Package includes the Lore which is present in Lil' Arena, the documentation of how it came to be, and a couple of stories that have been collaboratively told through the years among groups of friends.

"The Astral Planes of Leth, the Mother Realm, an entire universe unknown to anyone who still has a breath in their body; for only the Souls of those who died may enter"



The legend begins with Nimelle Dios, a kindhearted arch-sorceress who's been serving as the Soul Guide, ever since the destruction of the realm's core. She has single-handedly ensured the continuous flow of the newly-deceased for the past century, leading them to their respective planets in the Mother Realm.

Unless, ever so often, a soul dares to defy its own fate.



“Battle on, little soul. Enter my arenas, emerge victorious a thousand times, and be granted control over your destiny here in the Mother Realm.”

------

Contents ::

  • 1. The Lore of this World.pdf
  • 2. Lil' Arena - GDD (Lore).pdf
  • A map of Delasphos.png
  • [2015, Patras] Lenathas & The Drug Empire.pdf
  • [2018, Athens] The Root of Evil.pdf

This is a living package, and more content may be added to it.
